description: I like when young people have passion for what they do or would like to do. This boy was passionate about cooking. He spent four years at school learning how to cook properly and now wanted to put the knowledge into a good use. No problem, I always have a lot of cook jobs open. I offered him one of the best positions available. Partially because of his enthusiasm but mainly because of his sweet face and lean body. He was incredibly cute. To get the job he had to show me everything. When he finally undressed, my jaw just dropped on the floor. He was incredible. I couldn´t wait to put my cock inside him. So we had to bargain and it wasn´t easy at all. This boy wasn´t like all those money hungry guys I met before. There was genuine innocence in his eyes.
title: Dirty Scout 114
